<script>
        let slideIndex = 0;

        function showSlides() {
            let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("carousel");
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                slides[i].style.display = "none";
            }
            slideIndex++;
            if (slideIndex > slides.length) {
                slideIndex = 1;
            }
            slides[slideIndex - 1].style.display = "block";
        }

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            setTimeout(showSlides, 2000); // Change image every 2 seconds
        });
    </script>

error_fixes.fixed_line:
<script>
        // JavaScript code
        let slideIndex = 0;

        function showSlides() {
            let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("carousel");
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                slides[i].style.display = "none";
            }
            slideIndex++;
            if (slideIndex > slides.length) {
                slideIndex = 1;
            }
            slides[slideIndex - 1].style.display = "block";
            // Change image every 2 seconds
            setTimeout(showSlides, 2000);
        }

        // Call function when document is ready
        document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
            showSlides();
        });
    </script>

<script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            let videos = document.getElementsByTagName('video');
            for (let i=0; i < videos.length; i++) {
                videos[i].setAttribute('autoplay', 'false');
            }
        });

<video autoplay muted loop>
<!-- Add source tag here -->
</video>

<script>
    const videos = document.getElementsByTagName('video');
    for (let i = 0; i < videos.length; i++) {
        videos[i].removeAttribute('autoplay');
    }
</script>

<script>
function showSlides() {
    let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("carousel");
    for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
        slides[i].style.display = "none";
    }
    slideIndex++;
    if (slideIndex > slides.length) {
        slideIndex = 1;
    }
    slides[slideIndex - 1].style.display = "block";
    setTimeout(showSlides, 2000); // Change image every 2 seconds
}

const isAudioPlaying = () => {
    const videoElements = document.getElementsByTagName("video");
    for (let i = 0; i < videoElements.length; i++) {
        if (!videoElements[i].paused) {
            videoElements[i].pause();
        }
    }
};

isAudioPlaying();
showSlides();

error_fixes.fixed_line:
<style>
        /* CSS styles */
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background-color: #f4f4f4;
        }
        /* Header styles */
        header {
            background-color: #333;
            color: white;
            padding: 15px;
        }
        nav ul {
            list-style-type: none;
        }
        nav ul li {
            display: inline;
            margin-right: 20px;
        }
        nav ul li a {
            text-decoration: none;
            color: white;
        }
        /* Main content styles */
        main {
            padding: 20px;
        }
        /* Hero section */
        .hero {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 50px 0;
        }
        /* Product cards */
        .product-card {
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            padding: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            background-color: white;
        }
        .product-card img {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
        }
        /* Contact form styles */
        form {
            margin-top: 20px;
        }
        input[type="text"],
        input[type="email"],
        textarea {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        input[type="submit"] {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            background-color: #007bff;
            color: white;
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            /* Increase contrast by changing the background color */
            background-color: #0056b3;
        }
        input[type="submit"]:hover {
            background-color: #004080; /* Darker color on hover for contrast */
        }
    </style>
Use CSS for styling instead of <b>, <i>, or <font> tags

<script>
        // JavaScript code
        let slideIndex = 0;

        function showSlides() {
            let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("carousel");
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                slides[i].style.display = "none";
            }
            slideIndex++;
            if (slideIndex > slides.length) {
                slideIndex = 1;
            }
            slides[slideIndex - 1].style.display = "block";
            setTimeout(showSlides, 2000); // Change image every 2 seconds
        }

        showSlides();
</script>
error_fixes.fixed_line:
<script>
        // JavaScript code
        let slideIndex = 0;

        function showSlides() {
            let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("carousel");
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                slides[i].style.display = "none";
            }
            slideIndex++;
            if (slideIndex > slides.length) {
                slideIndex = 1;
            }
            slides[slideIndex - 1].style.display = "block";
            // Using setTimeout for accessibility purposes
            setTimeout(function() { 
                requestAnimationFrame(showSlides); 
            }, 2000);
        }

        showSlides();
</script>
<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="5; URL=another-page.html"> <!-- Meta refresh removed for better accessibility -->
